languages.text: По плану магоса Ханейманна, уничтожить крупное скопление еретиков и спасти плененного ими техножреца рекомендовано при помощи технологической диверсии.
According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.
languages.original_text: По плану магоса Ханейманна, уничтожить крупное скопление еретиков и спасти плененного ими техножреца рекомендовано при помощи технологической диверсии.

traits.locale_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.
According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.
According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

languages.text: Magos Haneumann hält technologische Sabotage für den optimalen Weg, die große Gruppe von Ketzern zu vernichten und den gefangenen Techpriester zu retten.
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Magos Haneumann hält technologische Sabotage für den optimalen Weg, die große Gruppe von Ketzern zu vernichten und den gefangenen Techpriester zu retten.

languages.text: D'après le magos Haneumann, un acte de sabotage technologique serait le meilleur moyen d'anéantir le groupe important d'hérétiques tout en sauvant le technoprêtre captif.
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: D'après le magos Haneumann, un acte de sabotage technologique serait le meilleur moyen d'anéantir le groupe important d'hérétiques tout en sauvant le technoprêtre captif.

languages.text: 根据哈努曼贤者的说法，如果想要把一大群异端分子全部歼灭，营救遭到俘虏的技术神甫，技术破坏行动是最合适的手段。
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: 根据哈努曼贤者的说法，如果想要把一大群异端分子全部歼灭，营救遭到俘虏的技术祭司，技术破坏行动是最合适的手段。

languages.text: マゴス・ヘニュマンによれば、大勢の異端者を壊滅させ、捕らえられた技術司祭を救出するには、科学技術による妨害が最適だという。
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: マゴス・ヘニュマンによれば、大勢の異端者を壊滅させ、捕らえられた技術司祭を救出するには、科学技術による妨害が最適だという。

languages.text: Según el Magos Haneumann, un acto de sabotaje tecnológico es la forma óptima de eliminar al gran grupo de herejes y rescatar al tecnosacerdote capturado.
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Según el Magos Haneumann, un acto de sabotaje tecnológico es la forma óptima de eliminar al gran grupo de herejes y rescatar al tecnosacerdote capturado.

languages.text: Magos Haneumann'a göre teknolojik sabotaj, kalabalık kâfir topluluğunu ortadan kaldırmanın ve esir alınan Tekno Rahip'i kurtarmanın en etkili yolu.
languages.original_text: According to Magos Haneumann, an act of technological sabotage is the optimal way to destroy the large group of heretics and rescue the captured Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Magos Haneumann'a göre teknolojik sabotaj, kalabalık kâfir topluluğunu ortadan kaldırmanın ve esir alınan Tekno Rahip'i kurtarmanın en etkili yolu.
